system.notes: Vessels struck by this weapon (and not stopped by void shields), have their speed reduced by 1 and Manoeuvrability reduced by 5 per successful attack. Effects remain for 2 Strategic Turns. Weapon doesn't cause critical hits or reduce hull integrity.
